name: P4Prism
description:
P4Prism

P4Prism is a puzzle-platformer where you control colorful creatures called prisms that can join together into other colors with the goal to get all of them to the portal and the end of the level. This game was created for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam and is my first attempt at making a game individually.

Font used: https://www.dafont.com/retro-gaming.font
Font created by Daymarius: https://www.dafont.com/daymarius.d7345
